modShortDescription: Allows you to change the menu background music at the start of the game without needing to patch the resources.assets file.
modDescription:
Allows you to change the menu background [music](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-sound-mod/) at the start of the game without needing to patch the resources.assets file. A sample music file in the ogg format has been provided for you to play around with.

This is a DMT mod. So requires [DMT Modding Tool](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/13037-dmt-modding-tool/).

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/TormentedEmu/7DTD-A19-DMTMods/tree/master/TE_MenuMusic)**

Please let her know if you have any questions, or have any problems/bugs with it. She is usually found on [Guppycurâ€™s Discord](https://discord.gg/mh3J3dS). Her nickname on the Discord is V.

**Credits:** [TormentedEmu](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/tormentedemu/)
